title: Release public
text: Good news, now flip and boom has been accessible to the public. Get free characters and skins at the beginning of release and feel the excitement of competing with AI
author: Admin

title: Free Characters
text: Free Character Especially for you new players who register in the initial 1 month period of the release date
author: Admin

title: Leaderboard system
text: Our Leaderboar system shows the player with the highest score at each difficulty level, ranking can be broken by other players. Let's compete for the first place
author: Admin

title: Community
text: The community in a game aims to exchange experiences and excitement when playing games. Sometimes each player can also exchange opinions about something related to the game or helping each other when there are needed
author: Admin
